headline: Fiserv Acquires CardFree to Enhance Clover Point-of-Sale System
summary: Fiserv Inc. (NYSE:FI) is one of the best IT stocks to invest in according to hedge funds. On September 8, Fiserv announced the acquisition of CardFree, which is a platform that provides customized order, payment, and loyalty solutions for merchants. The financial terms of the deal were not disclosed. The acquisition is expected to enhance […]

headline: Fiserv: Undervalued Fintech Positioned For Double-Digit Growth
summary: Discover why Fiserv is a top buy-the-dip fintech stock with 30% upside potential, strong earnings growth, and a leading position in payment processing.
